DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Did you hear anything about ghost matter disappearing?
Where do I look for this skeleton again, Galena?
I saw the skeleton in the drain, Galena.
Hey, Galena. Did you hear anything about ghost matter disappearing?
Where do I look for this skeleton again, Galena?
I saw the skeleton in the drain, Galena.
Hey, Galena. Did you hear anything about ghost matter disappearing?
Where do I look for this skeleton again, Galena?
I saw the skeleton in the drain, Galena.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>No..? I've never heard of that before..</size>
<size=20>Um...</size>
<size=20>So how do you make ghosts disappear, astronaut?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Er.. Are there.. ghosts in the village somewhere?

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Oh...</size>
<size=20>Um, could you help me make a ghost disappear anyway, astronaut?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Are there.. ghosts in the village somewhere?

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Um.. I'm not sure.. Mayor Rutile says I'm just hearing noises.</size>
<size=20>But.. I think there's a ghost who's angry at me, because I found its skeleton the other day..</size>
<size=20>While I was playing in the river, my toy got swept down the river, into the drain behind the village waterwheel..</size>
<size=20>When I crawled into the drain behind the waterwheel to get my toy back... I discovered a creepy skeleton in there!</size>
<size=20>It was so scary... I feel like it's watching me all the time now...</size>
<size=20>Could you please use your Little Scout to look in the drain to see if the skeleton's still there, astronaut?</size>
<size=20>It's in the drain behind the village waterwheel. You'll find it if you just follow the river down the village..</size>
<size=20>Um, it's really cramped in there, so you might need to rotate the Little Scout's camera to see in there...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: I'll see what I can do.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Um.. The little drain behind the village waterwheel. You'll see it if you follow the river down the village..</size>
<size=20>I'd just like you to look into there with your Little Scout for me..</size>
<size=20>It's really cramped in there though, so you might need to rotate the Little Scout's camera to see in there...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: I'll see what I can do!

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Really..? Thank you..</size>
<size=20>Oh...</size>
<size=20>Um, I guess it'd be worse if it'd disappeared somehow. That'd be even scarier...</size>
<size=20>But since you saw it.. That means you'll be haunted now too, astronaut.</size>
<size=20>That makes me feel a little better. Now, we'll be haunted together...</size>
<size=20>Thank you, astronaut.. Stay safe in space!</size>
